ComicInfo.Title: Mega-City Manhunt, Part 4: Mental Block
ComicInfo.Summary:
The long run is over, and Dredd wants Chief Justice Cal to answer for his crimes! But Mega-City One is already in twitchy, paranoid chaos (namely thanks to the events of the previous 27 issues). What will the news of Cal’s deceptions do to the soul of the city? That’s when Judge Anderson comes up with a shocking solution that could change the Meg forever…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Torres | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | James O'Barr | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Cal, Judge Anderson, Judge Dredd
